Title: Dreaming Sarah
column9: "Inspired by the horror game Yume Nikki
column10: Dreaming Sarah is a surreal adventure platformer game with puzzle elements
column12: an incredibly diverse cast of characters
column14: a young girl named Sarah. Sarah has been on an accident and is in a coma. It's up to you help her wake up by exploring her dream world while collecting items
column15: talking to weird characters and exploring the world around her!"

Title: Child of Light
column10: awakens on the lost fairytale continent of Lemuria. To return home she must fight against the dark creatures of the Queen of the Night
column12: the moon and the stars. At stake is not only Lemuria
